newsitem.title: USA: CBOE to trade PairGain LEAPS on June 11.
newsitem.headline: CBOE to trade PairGain LEAPS on June 11.

text.p: The Chicago Board Options Exchange (CBOE) said Tuesday it will list LEAPS (Long term Equity Anticipation Securities) on shares of PairGain Technologies Inc on June 11.
The LEAPS will have opening strike prices of 15, 20 and 25 with expirations in January 1999 and January 2000.
Equity LEAPS trade in units of 100 shares of stock per contract, have American-style exercise and settle in stock.
